title: Aldnoah.Zero 2nd Season (Aldnoah.Zero)
synopsis: The war between the Terrans and the Vers Empire of Mars has ended, allowing humanity to blissfully enjoy their lives in a time of peace. Nineteen months later, however, the Vers princess makes a shocking public declaration: "the Terrans are a foolish race that covets resources, destroys nature, and are devoted to the pursuit of pleasure." And so, to protect their precious Earth, she calls upon her knights to take up arms, and the raging battle between the two civilizations reignites.
characters: ['Kaizuka, Inaho', 'Troyard, Slaine', 'Vers Allusia, Asseylum', 'Amifumi, Inko', 'Kaizuka, Yuki', 'Areash, Rayet', 'Marito, Kouichirou', 'Vers Envers, Lemrina', 'Magbaredge, Darzana', 'Saazbaum']
